Your First Step Costs Nothing

Schedule Your Free
15-Minute Consultation

No pressure. No commitment. Just a conversation to see if we're the right fit for your journey.

This Free Consultation Is For You If...

  • You're struggling with depression, stress, or feeling overwhelmed
  • Addiction has taken hold and you're ready for a change
  • Current medications aren't working or have difficult side effects
  • You want a provider who truly understands recovery
  • You need flexible telehealth or in-person options

What to Expect

1

Share Your Story

Brief overview of what you're experiencing and your goals.

2

Ask Questions

Learn about our approach and how we might help.

3

Decide Together

If it's a good fit, schedule your first appointment.
